alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 12:09AM EST until January 09 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of less than one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Pocahontas County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Latest indications are that rain will hold off until close to dawn Sunday, if not slightly later. Any rain does does arrive by mid morning Sunday is likely to freeze on surfaces, especially on southeast facing slopes below 4000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. If the road looks wet, assume it is icy. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
